apple_vendor_description: This handshake emoji on Apple devices showcases two hands meeting with a sense of firm connection, rendered in a rich dark skin tone and a warm medium-dark skin tone. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting highlight the subtle contours of the fingers and palms, conveying trust and agreement. The smooth gradients and soft edges make this gesture of solidarity and partnership feel both professional and sincere, ideal for sealing deals or expressing mutual respect in digital conversations on Apple devices.
